carte  
designPattern  

  • carte中Carte的使用

    返回Carte的carte中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Carte Joueur.getCarteNow()
    This method gets the card currently in the player's hand.
    Carte Joueur.getVictoryCarte()
    This method gets the victory card of the player.
    Carte Deck.tirerCarteDessus()
    This method returns the first card of the LinkedList of the cards in the deck.
    参数类型为Carte的carte中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void Joueur.prendreCarte​(Carte carte)
    This method is used for the player to get a card and this card is carteNow which is the card currently in the player's hand.
    void Joueur.setVictoryCarte​(Carte c)
    This method sets up the victory card of the player.
    参数类型为Carte的carte中的构造器
    构造器 说明
    Carte​(Carte c)
    This is the constructor of the class Carte.

    This method creates a new chessboard and initializes the chessboard to null.
